articles.author: Ariana Garcia
articles.title: Black holes keep 'burping out' stars they ate years ago - Chron
articles.description: Astronomers observe black holes 'burping out' stars that they consumed years ago and aren't sure why.
articles.content:
Astronomers have observed black holes burping out stellar material years after consuming a star and they don't know why. 
Elen11/Getty Images/iStockphoto
